news.title: Starmer suspends four rebel MPs for breaching party discipline
news.summary: Neil Duncan-Jordan, Brian Leishman, Chris Hinchliff and Rachael Maskell all voted against welfare reforms.

news.title: 'Serious questions' for Tories over Afghan data breach, says PM
news.summary: Details of thousands of Afghans who supported UK forces were mistakenly leaked under the last government.

news.title: BBC gains rare access to US base tracking global missile strikes
news.summary: From their base in Colorado, Space Force units track missiles fired anywhere in the world.

news.title: Counter-terror scheme missed chance to intervene in life of Southport killer, says review
news.summary: A major review found the counter-terror scheme could have potentially turned the killer away from violence.

news.title: Co-op boss confirms all 6.5 million members had data stolen in cyber-attack
news.summary: In her first interview since the attack, Co-op's chief executive said she was "incredibly sorry" to customers.

news.title: Faisal Islam: Surprise inflation jump complicates interest rate decision
news.summary: Higher inflation could give the Bank of England pause for thought over cutting interest rates.

news.title: At least 20 killed in crush at US-backed GHF aid site in Gaza
news.summary: For the first time, the Israel and US-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation confirms deaths at one of its sites.

news.title: Southern Water issues hosepipe ban for 1m people
news.summary: Southern Water announces water restrictions for Hampshire and the Isle of Wight from Monday.

news.title: Porn sites to introduce age checks for UK users - but how will it work?
news.summary: Anyone in the UK wanting to access online porn will soon have to undergo more rigorous age checks.

news.title: US deports five 'barbaric' migrants to Eswatini
news.summary: The five people convicted of serious crimes come from Vietnam, Jamaica, Laos, Cuba and Yemen, the US says.
